channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1713; 09:36PM; 21608 W Nordhoff St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T9hSdZ; Canoga Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving fire companies (prior to additionally requested units) extinguished the fire in 20 minutes with no injuries reported. LAFD Heavy Equipment is responding to assist moving debris to facilitate overhaul, ensuring no pockets of fire remain. No further details.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E103 E104 E106 E107 E273 E287 E288 E296 E305 E72 E87 E89 EM15 HR3 RA89 RA896 RA96 SQ87 T105 T73 T87 T88 T96 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1713; 09:16PM; 9030 N Owensmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RoIM0k; Canoga Park; Large scrap metal recycling yard with heavy fire showing. One additional task force requested. Firefighters are performing forcible entry to gain access and are in the offensive mode.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E104 E106 E107 E273 E296 E305 RA896 RA96 T105 T73 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#0942; 02:04PM; 1056 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4a3osce; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: Firefighters extinguished the fire in 29 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was held to less than 2 acres and all structures were defended from any damage. Firefighters will be on scene conducting mop up operations to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 E1 E14 E2 E203 E3 E447 E458 E47 E90 EM1 H1 H3 H7 HA1 HA3 HA7 RA17 T3; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0942; 01:35PM; 1056 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4a3osce; Boyle Heights; Approximately 1/2 acre of grass burning uphill with homes exposed at the top of Mott St (by the 5 Freeway). Firefighters are attacking the hot flank and additional crews are responding to Mott St to defend the homes. ; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E1 E14 E2 E203 E3 E447 E458 E90 EM1 H0A H0D T3; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0766; 12:18PM; 1416 S Albany St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sZ2BBU; Pico-Union; KNOCKDOWN: 38 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. They held the fire to the unit of origin, preventing extension into the attic or adjoining units. Firefighters are conducting salvage operations on the unit below in case of water damage. A primary and secondary search of the unit found no occupants.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E15 E210 E215 E6 RA13 RA810 SQ21 T10 T15; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0766; 11:56AM; 1416 S Albany St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sZ2BBU; Pico-Union; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire in one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E15 E210 E215 E6 RA13 RA810 SQ21 T10 T15; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 11/30/2023 INC#0565

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#0565; 10:21AM; Wb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uG17gt; Tujunga; All forward progress stopped at approximately 1/2 acre. Firefighters are working to ensure any fuel run off from the truck is captured. Traffic on the WB 210 Freeway will be impacted as firefighters mop up the hot spots in the brush and ensure no hazards remain. Follow CHP Log# 0769 for traffic updates. No further details.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 DZ45 E24 E274 E28 E298 E42 E60 E75 E86 E98 EM12 FR91 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 HE1 T74 T98 WT88; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0565; 09:54AM; Wb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uG17gt; Tujunga; A big rig (with 40' trailer) fully involved in fire, exposing and beginning to extend into light-medium brush. This was originally reported as an auto fire and upgraded to a brush fire response. ; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E28 E298 E42 E75 E86 E98 EM12 FR91 H0B H0C T74 T98; CH5; 18; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#1170; 04:24PM; Graveyard Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/47QcvV2; Tujunga; LAFD Air Operations worked in close coordination with the call taker from Metro Fire Communications on the phone with the reporting party to help guide them to the hiker's location far up the hillside, near the top of a ridge. LAFD Air Ops lowered a rescuer to evaluate the patient and determined a hoist operation was appropriate. The operation is underway and the adult male will be transported to the hospital with non-life threatening fall related injuries. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 3:42PM. No further details.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E298 E90 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA55 RA74 RA874 RH114 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1695; 08:34PM; 4017 S Hooper Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3N6RT2Z; Central-Alameda; Two story, single family dwelling well involved in fire with one other home exposed. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. LADWP added due to wires down. ; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E10 E14 E15 E21 E210 E215 E221 E233 E33 RA14 RA814 SQ21 T10 T15 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
